section.title: web.xml
section.para:
This file, which is a requirement of the Java Servlet Specification
You can get a copy of the Java Servlet Specification directly from Sun Microsystems' web site at the following URL: http://java.sun.com/products/servelet/download.html , contains information specific to the application server under which the application si running. As an example, it might contain a mapping of URLs to specific servlets that should handle those URLs. It might also contain references to data sources (i.e. database handles) referenced in the main application server's configuration. For application servers that run according to a standards compliant servlet specification, this file is necessary.
